body.name: QEIUZON 3 Drawer Dresser, Modern Rattan Dresser Chest with Wide Drawers and Metal Handles, Farmhouse Wood Storage Chest of Drawers for Bedroom, Living Room, Hallway, Entryway (Walnut)
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Modern design】 The 3-drawer dresser with simple design. Various decoration styles are compatible with this modern minimalist 3 drawer chest. Adding rattan door and classic gold metal handle to the simple monochromatic wood panel adds advanced aesthetics to this product.

【Big Storage space】 Three widened and enlarged drawers provide spacious storage space for your trivial sundries and meet your storage needs in every possible way. The durable crafted engineered wood can withstand wear as well as traditional solid wood furniture.

【Sturdy and stable】 Our products have undergone multiple tests of strict selection and load bearing. We choose thick MDF boards, which will provide solid stability to the product. Our products are also water and scratch resistant, so you can rest assured that you will have years of use.

【Multipurpose】 The 3-drawer dresser with simple design, is perfect for multiple occasions like office, bedroom and kitchen. Not only can be used as dresser, but also can be an accent storage cabinet for living room.

【Easy to Assemble】 All parts and detailed instructions included. 31.5" L x 13.78" W x 31.3" H. We are equipped with accurate installation instructions for easy assembly. Please feel free to contact us with any questions you may have about our products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I honestly love these dressers! I was nervous bc it’s from Amazon but they’re pretty nice. Obviously not the best quality ever but they are very sturdy and get the job done. They are a lil smaller than I thought they’d be but I didn’t actually look at the measurements before I bought it so that’s on me. They were also very easy to put together, took me a bit to do it all but it wasn’t hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful design, but poor quality
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased the drawer. The drawers do not stay in place. It takes a while to put it together.Not sturdy. I wish I could return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Drawers will not stay on track!!!
reviews.reviewText: Put it together and it looked great and then the drawers all fell down! They will not stay on track...it is like the drawers are too narrow or the tracks are to small! Either way...It's crap! Not worth the money...Now I have to figure out how to fix this...not taking apart again...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Impressive for the price, amazing design, awful drawer pulls
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I was a little worried but I had seen this exact product listed elsewhere for twice the price so I decided to go for it. To my surprise everything was in great condition on delivery, assembly was very simple and straightforward especially when comparing it to similar products I’ve gotten from American furniture warehouse, with fit and finish after completion to be the same if not better then those too! It looks fantastic in my room! The reviews about the drawer pulls are dead on though. I expected as much, opening and closing the drawers was pretty wobbly and wouldn’t always close flat but now two days of having this my top drawer falls down in the back if I close it all the way. I had planned if this was the case I would just install my own which I plan on doing tomorrow and should fix the problem. All in all if I had payed $250-300 and had good drawers I would be content and very happy with the purchase, this is way cheaper and I have to spend a little extra time fixing it so it works out and I’m glad I bought it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute and Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous to purchase furniture off of Amazon but these were a great find. The got delivered super quickly and they look great. I hate building furniture but these were super easy to put together. I will say you get what you pay for in quality. Compared to other dressers these are pretty cheap so the wood isn't real and the hinges do move around a little. The drawers are pretty shallow so if you're looking for something to store a ton of clothes in I wouldn't recommend getting these. Overall they have been perfect for me and I love the boho vibe they add t my room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute design but I got two different dressers….
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: the company reached out to me and offered to send an additional dresser to match one of the ones I bought. Very nice of them to do so.I love the design, however, functionally they are a bit small, don’t hold as much as most regular sized dressers. My biggest problem with this order was that they sent me two slightly different dressers. They arrived and I built one and was excited so I started building the other and there were small differences but I figured it’s probably fine and when I finished building the second one I went to put the handles on and they look noticeably different than the first one. The handles are two different shades of gold, different lengths, different designs too. I was very annoyed but I wasn’t about to undo all that work. Just frustrating. The front panels are also slight different in the thickness and the legs slight different in the way they’re made. I might just order some new handles and use it in our guest room because we need something that holds more for my husband and I. But if they had been identical it would be enough drawer space for one person and would look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: I love this dress, absolutely adore it. It did take a long time to make, but once you get into the groove of things, the directions are easy to follow and takes about an hour and a half. The quality isnt the best, but I wouldnt expect such high quality from something that was only 140. Instead, I am happy with the price, the overall look of the product and how it just looks expensive, like a dupe of the kids Maren Olive Green and Cane Wood 6-Drawer Dresser from CB2, which costs over $1000!So definitely worth the money, for its aesthetic but quality isnt the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute, beautiful, and sturdy drawer. Also the customer service is very responsive and responds promptly.
